text:
The Controller shall prepare the Annual Appropriation Ordinance in a format which, to the extent possible, provides adequate controls over the various revenue and expenditure items by programs, departments, and priorities as set forth in the annual budget approved by the Mayor, is consistent with generally accepted accounting principles and standards as well as the provisions of Charter Section 
3.105. The Controller shall revise the Appropriation Ordinance as required to reflect any changes to the budget initiated by the Board of Supervisors. 
(Added by Ord. 223-97, App. 6/6/97)

heading.catch_text: ANNUAL APPROPRIATION ORDINANCE, PREPARATION AND FORMAT.
